Description: Required Skills to be Successful:Job-Specific Technical Skills:•   Should possess hands-on experience in the installation, configuration, and commissioning of GRMS /ELV systems. •   Must be well-versed in the T&C of (GRMS/ACS/CCTV systems) including Honeywell Inncom, Interel GRMS & Lighting Control Systems•   Good experience in systems integration and experience in any configuration and programming software for GRMS/Lighting Control/ELV systems•   Integration of controls, room temperature, lighting, HVAC system, audio systems, curtains, TV, and other options in the room.•   Detailed working knowledge and experience in Operations and Maintenance of GRMSsystems•   Fault Finding & troubleshooting skills in AUDIO & VIDEO Systems. •   General knowledge and experience of Electrical Safety Rules and procedures.•   The ability to accurately read and interpret drawings & schematics.•   Experience with other technology systems, such as CCTV/ACS/BMS is a plus..•   Technical training & certifications from manufacturers on GRMS system.Behavioral Competencies :•   Detail-oriented and strong analytical skills.•   Excellent problem-solving skills•   Excellent interpersonal skills•   Excellent time management.•   Ability to work extended hours (overtime/weekends) as needed.•   Ability to be scheduled for on-call status if or as needed.•   The position may require daily travel to worksites, and employees must be able to get to worksites independently.•   Provide professional and courteous interaction with customers. •   Team Player.Job Details
